department.ch: 土木工程學系營建管理碩士班
department.en: Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering

goal.ch: 本課程主要目的是介紹專案管理知識中的「專案採購管理」專業知識，透過專案採購管理所需基本知識、國內政府採購法、以及實際採購案例(工程、財物與勞務)之研析，讓學生掌握專案執行過程中應具備的採購管理知識。此外，為增加學生學習採購知識的應用，本課程透過採購招標與投標的模擬，使學生熟悉招標與投標的運作與實務知識。
goal.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the professional knowledge of “project procurement management“ in project management domain. Through the introduction of basic knowledge required for project procurement management, domestic government procurement act, and practical procurement case studies (construction, goods, and services), students will obtain the procurement management knowledge necessary for project execution. Additionally, to enhance students‘ application of procurement knowledge, this course simulates procurement bidding and tendering processes, allowing students to become familiar with the operation and practical knowledge of bidding and tendering.

outline.ch:
1.課程介紹
2.專案管理知識簡介
3.專案之採購規劃知識
4.專案之採購執行知識
5.專案之採購履約管理知識
6.專案之採購結束知識
7.政府採購之招標及決標
8.政府採購之履約管理
9.政府採購之驗收
10.政府採購之爭議處理
11.工程採購案例研析
12.財物採購案例研析
13.勞務採購案例研析
14.採購招、投標模擬
15.專案管理與採購專業證照分析
16.期末報告與討論
outline.en:
1. Course Introduction
2. Introduction to Project Management Knowledge
3. Knowledge of Procurement Planning for Projects
4. Knowledge of Procurement Execution for Projects
5. Knowledge of Procurement Performance Management for Projects
6. Knowledge of Procurement Closure for Projects
7. Bidding and Awarding of Government Procurement
8. Contract Management for Government Procurement
9. Acceptance of Government Procurement
10. Dispute Resolution for Government Procurement
11. Analysis of Construction Procurement Cases
12. Analysis of Goods Procurement Cases
13. Analysis of Services Procurement Cases
14. Procurement Bidding and Tendering Simulation
15. Analysis of Project Management and Procurement Professional Certifications
16. Final Presentation and Discussion

gradMethod.ch:
1.出席狀況 (20％)
2.期中考試 (20％)
3.招標案例模擬報告 (30％)
4.投標案例模擬報告 (30％)
gradMethod.en:
1.Attendance and Participation: 20％
2.Mid-term Exam.: 20％
3.Mid-term presentation (Tendering conference): 30％
4.Term presentation (Bidding competition): 30％

flexDiscription.ch: 將於16週內與學生討論如何補充兩週的學習內容，包含學生自主學習與額外時間授課。
